name: easy-exports
title: Easy Exports
description:
Easy Exports speeds up backups of your Foundry VTT world. Instead of right-clicking every Journal, Scene, Actor, etc. simply right-click the section in the Sidebar and pick the Easy Export option from the pop-up window. Works for Macros too!
NEW in 0.4: Easily recover lost Actors, Journals, etc. with the new Import option
author: Spetzel
